name: Character Arc
description: Use this framework to evaluate how your character changes throughout the narrative

attributes.name: First Impression
attributes.description: What is the character they like as the story begins? How do they typically think, behave, and interact with the world?

attributes.name: Goal
attributes.description: What is the character's goal? What do they want to win, gain, obtain, or achieve?

attributes.name: Flaw
attributes.description: What undesirable qualities or weaknesses are holding the character back from achieving their goal?

attributes.name: Aha! Moment
attributes.description: When does the character recognize their flaw and how it negatively affects them? What is that moment like?

attributes.name: Action
attributes.description: How does the character react to their Aha! Moment? What actions do they take to avoid their flaw or transform it into a strength?

attributes.name: Transformation
attributes.description: What is the character like at the end of the story? How do they change after recognizing their flaw and taking action?
